html:
Employee Payout

Date : {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.today(), 'dd-MM-YYYY') }}

To,
Branch Manager,
Bank Of India, Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai

Please Debit Current Account: {{ doc.payment_account }} and Credit the A/C of the following Employee of our Company {{ doc.company }}

From : {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.start_date, 'dd-MM-YYYY')}} To : {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.end_date, 'dd-MM-YYYY')}}

Mobile No. : +91-9321179937

Cheque No. :

Date :

{%- for row in doc.empdata -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr.# Employee ID Employee Name Net Pay Account No.
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.employee }}
{{ row.employee_name }}
 {{ row.get_formatted("rounded_total", doc) }} {{ row.bank_ac_no }}
{{ doc.total_in_words }} Total : {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}

We declare that the account of the beneficiaries mentioned in the hard copy and that the bank is not responsible for any mistake between the hard copy

Please credit the respective accounts
Thanking You
For
name: Employee_Payout_Print
